description:
This dataset provides the year, county, amount, grant category, general location, and project name of Hudson River Estuary Grants.  This program is managed by the New York State Department of Environmental Conservation (DEC).  It began in 1987 and focuses on the tidal
Hudson and its adjacent watershed

metadata.attribution: New York State Department of Environmental Conservation

name: Hudson River Estuary Grants Program Awards:  Beginning 1999
